General.Name: Hangzhou Landscaping Incorporated
General.Description: Hangzhou Landscaping Incorporated engages in the garden engineering construction business in China. The company is involved in the designing of garden landscape; research, development, and production of flower seeds and seedlings; and garden maintenance and ecological gardens. It operates and maintains construction projects, such as municipal public gardens, villages, and ecological restoration. In addition, the company offers agricultural and tourism development services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
